lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said a decision by the PCGG last week to probe street certificates held by brokers at Manila's two stock exchanges was prompted by suspicion that illegal funds were in circulation.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Street certificates describe securities held in the name of a broker or another nominee instead of a customer so as to permit easy trading or transfer.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The head of a Philippine panel charged with recovering illegal wealth accumulated by former President Ferdinand Marcos and his associates said they still controlled large funds circulating in the country's economy.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said a decision by the PCGG last week to probe street certificates held by brokers at Manila's two stock exchanges was prompted by suspicion that illegal funds were in circulation.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Street certificates describe securities held in the name of a broker or another nominee instead of a customer so as to permit easy trading or transfer.

lst.name: sentence
